alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; DeKalb; Forsyth; Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Cherokee, northern DeKalb, southwestern Forsyth, southwestern Gwinnett and northeastern Fulton Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1039 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Sweat Mountain to Clarkston, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Alpharetta, Dunwoody, Milton, Duluth, Lilburn, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Berkeley Lake, Pine Lake, Tucker, Belvedere Park, North Decatur and North Atlanta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; DeKalb; Forsyth; Gwinnett; North Fulton
